item.title: Tentang
item.description: Tim adalah seorang perencana kota dan geografi yang tertarik pada teknologi pemetaan, representasi, dan tata ruang dalam konteks pembangunan ekonomi. Ia juga tertarik pada ilmu data dan ilmu computer. Pada tahun 2020 ia lulus dari Harvard Graduate School of Design dan mulai belajar tingkat S3 di Cornell University dalam jurusan sosiologi pembangunan (Curriculum Vitae). Ia punya LinkedIn, Academia.edu, Github, Twitter, dan Instagram.

item.title: About
item.description: Tim is an urban planner and geographer whose research focuses on the political economy of mapping in domestic and international development programming in Indonesia. Geospatial representation involves not only geometric and geographic assumptions, but ontological and ideological ones as well. Who benefits when it is standardized? He’s also a data- and compsci-curious, and is excited to get beyond writing dinky R scripts and into stuff like…setting up his own website. And thinking about how computational capacity is transforming our economies, societies, and politics.
